ing: 2 fluid ounces sweet and sour mix
des: "My daughter had a Melonade at a restaurant out of town, and came home raving about it.  The menu gave the ingredients, but it took some experimenting to come up with proportions that matched the taste as she remembered it.  I'm not much of a drinker, but I find this refreshing and delicious.  I sometimes make mine without the vodka and think it's great as well."
ins: Fill a tumbler with ice cubes and pour in the melon liqueur, sour mix, vodka, and lemon-lime soda. Stir to mix.
